title: Pixel 3xl random (dust like) spot in photos from all applications (photos attached)
content:
A few weeks ago i noticed on snapchat when taking photos there is a random spot. The spot also shows up on all applications for the rear camera. This spot isnt like other posts ive found when searching, as this isnt a dark shade spot, it can be zoomed in on when taking a video or picture and has separation. I cant see anything from the outside so unsure if this is dust stuck inside or sensor damage somehow.
here are some examples, any help would be appreciated
https://imgur.com/a/kwx80nQ
